sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a trapezium.
message_1: A trapezium has two parallel sides of length 10 cm and 12 cm, and two non-parallel sides of length 5 cm each. Find the perimeter of the trapezium.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of the trapezium, we simply add the lengths of all four sides together.

Perimeter = (10 cm) + (12 cm) + (5 cm) + (5 cm) = 32 cm

The perimeter of the trapezium is 32 cm.
